TestStep.Description: Invokes Helidroid and keeps it running for the specified duration. PREREQUISITES: Android: Helidroid_3D.apk should be installed on the DUT: It can be found in Artifactory at acs_test_artifacts/CONCURRENCY/TESTS/Helidroid_3D. In addition, the following APK should be installed on the DUT: Helidroid_3D.apk Windows: Windows version of the game is not available.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device that will run the application

Parameter.name: DURATION
Parameter.Description: How long the test will run, in minutes.

Parameter.name: GAME_PACKAGE
Parameter.Description: Package name for Helidroid, as it appears in PackageManager
